results.text: The Freemex market is open. Log in to freemex.mkti.in.
Don't forget to lock in your teams for tomorrow's Australia vs Sri Lanka match. Go to freepl.mkti.in.
The hunt has intensified. Hurry up and head over to treasurehunt.mkti.in.
The Freemex market has closed for the day after some heavy trading. Hope to see you all back when the market opens again at 9 pm.
FreePL teams lock at 11 pm. Hurry up and log in to freepl.mkti.in
Online Tresure Hunt has started. Log in to treasurehunt.mkti.in
Freemex starts at 9 pm. Log in to freemex.mkti.in
Due to requests from people to postpone the event till after dinner, the Online Treasure Hunt will now start at 9:30 pm.
Check out the standings for yesterday's play at freepl.mkti.in and lock your teams for tomorrow's match before 11 pm tonight.
Send in your entries for Brainmesh to brainmesh@mkti.in. Sponsored by Ungineering.
The Freemex market is closed for the day. Log back in tomorrow at 9 pm as the market reopens to newer surprises !
Online Treasure Hunt starts tomorrow at 8pm.
The FreePL teams for tomorrow's match have been locked. Log in to freepl.mkti.in tomorrow to see how you fared.
Lock your FreePL teams before 11 pm tonight for tomorrow's match between Australia and Sri Lanka. Head over to freepl.mkti.in
Freemex has started. Go to freemex.mkti.in to participate.
Entries for web-based app making contest Brainmesh are open till 30th Jan'13.
Freemex starts at 9 pm tonight
Mukti '13 is here. February 2nd to 5th, 2013. Rediscover Freedom!
